info.name: Dark Mode - Dragalia lost Gamepress and Gamepedia
info.description: A Dark Theme for Dragalia Lost Gamepress ass well as Gamepedia, I noticed that there were no themes for gamepress and my eyes didn't like summoning at 2 am at night while my heart did. In the past I made one simply for Gamepress but it has now been updated to include Gamepedia as well.
info.additionalInfo:
Additionally taken inspiration from user Anon4k
Code has been modified to work specially on these sites
